column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I think the best time to come here is on a weekday rather than a weekend. A friend and I had breakfast here this morning and just had the best one in a while! There was no waiting in line
column4: besides being very pleasing to the eye and in generous portions
column5: tasted very good as well! Their coffee comes from local Intelligencia
column6: which my friend has taken into great liking.
